long_description: This SRAM PC 1091 chain delivers top-level performance in a strong, long-lasting design for the 10-speed drivetrain of your beloved road bike. Heavily chamfered outer plates deliver enhanced shifting performance and quieter running; inner plates boast a new finish and chrome hardened pin construction for longer life. Use of hollow pins save weight and are designed to enhance shifting response, all while maintaining strength. Compatible with SRAM and Shimano 10-speed drivetrains. No special tools are required for install; PowerLock connecting link is good for a one-time application only.
short_description: This SRAM PC 1091 chain delivers top-level performance in a strong, long-lasting design for the 10-speed drivetrain of your beloved road bike.
